Personal Injury Law Firm Clearwater, FL

At the Romano Law Firm, the number one goal for our Tampa personal injury law firm is to get all of our clients adequate compensation. We understand the many serious psychological, financial, and physical problems that can result from even a minor injury, and we have the expertise to help clients will all varieties of personal injuries.


Without representation against a multi-billion dollar insurance company, it can seem like you have no voice. That’s why the Romano Law Firm is committed to making your voice heard so that you will get the financial relief you deserve. Our Clearwater personal injury attorneys will help you understand your rights so that no one will take advantage of your situation. We handle a range of personal injury cases, which includes Tampa auto accident cases.

Choosing a Personal Injury Law Firm in Clearwater

Whether your injury is physical or psychological, you need to find a Clearwater personal injury law firm that will work for you. At the Romano Law Firm, we always take the time to make sure that our clients understand their rights and that we understand their unique situation. Rather than trying to fit your case to a pre-arranged formula, we will evaluate your individual case and decide the best way to go about seeking financial compensation before moving forward. The Romano Law Firm has the heart of a small firm with the resources of a large firm, and we will always aggressively pursue justice for you.


More often than not, personal injury victims receive significantly more compensation if they are represented by a personal injury law firm than if they are not. So, if you or someone you know has been injured and deserves compensation, do not hesitate to call the Romano Law Firm. With your financial stability at stake, you don’t want to take a chance.


If you live in the Tampa area, we can help. We offer personal injury services throughout the area, including to nearby Dunedin and St. Petersburg.

Call today at (813) 293-9000 to discuss your Clearwater personal injury case.


While we have offices throughout the Tampa area, we can also fly or drive to meet clients. In addition, we offer webcam appointments. One of our office locations includes:
